analysis.description:
depositofferToken.refund (/unique_chucks/38/0x4a3b35487a56cfb9df80716054f793aa4c3bc1f2.sol#582-608) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _addr.transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4a3b35487a56cfb9df80716054f793aa4c3bc1f2.sol#605-606)

depositofferToken.destroy (/unique_chucks/38/0x4a3b35487a56cfb9df80716054f793aa4c3bc1f2.sol#698-708) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)
